Change Log

All notable changes to this resolver will be documented in this file. This project adheres to Semantic Versioning. This change log adheres to standards from Keep a CHANGELOG.

Unreleased

v0.3.1 - 2017-06-23

Changed

  • bumped debug dep to match other packages

v0.3.0 - 2016-12-15

Changed

  • bumped resolve to fix issues with Node builtins (thanks @SkeLLLa and @ljharb)

Fixed

  • use files in package.json to ship only index.js (#531, thanks for noticing @lukeapage)

v0.2.3 - 2016-08-20

Added

  • debug logging (use DEBUG=eslint-plugin-import:resolver:node eslint [...])

v0.2.2 - 2016-07-14

Fixed

  • Node resolver no longer declares the import plugin as a peerDependency. See #437 for a well-articulated and thoughtful expression of why this doesn't make sense. Thanks @jasonkarns for the issue and the PR to fix it (#438).

    Also, apologies to the others who expressed this before, but I never understood what the problem was.ðŸ˜…

v0.2.1

Fixed

  • find files with .json extensions (#333, thanks for noticing @jfmengels)
